changeSet.author: MineStar
changeSet.comment: FUG-10204: Update Barrier Category to Entry
changeSet.sql: UPDATE MACHINECATEGORY SET NAME = 'Entry' WHERE NAME = 'Barrier'

rollback.sql: UPDATE MACHINECATEGORY SET NAME = 'Barrier' WHERE NAME = 'Entry'

changeSet.author: MineStar
changeSet.comment: FUG-10204: Update Barrier Class to Entry
changeSet.sql: UPDATE MACHINECLASS SET NAME = 'UndergroundEntry' WHERE NAME = 'UndergroundBarrier'

rollback.sql: UPDATE MACHINECLASS SET NAME = 'UndergroundBarrier' WHERE NAME = 'UndergroundEntry'
